stitch top for the ribbed top see the separate instructions opposite row 24 and 25 knit row 26 27 and 28 purl row 29 k1 p1 to end making up row 30 p1 k1 to end row 31 repeat row 29 ⇨ note use mattress stitch for seaming row 32 repeat row 30 fold the knitted piece in half lengthwise and sew the side edges together sew the cast on edge row 33 repeat row 29 together along the bottom fold over the top
